head.title: National Briefing | South: Florida: $75 Million Donated To Hospital

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | South: Florida: $75 Million Donated To Hospital

abstract.p: Boca Raton Community Hospital in Florida announces that it has received $75 million from Schmidt Family Foundation, one of largest gifts given to hospital (S)

block.p: The Boca Raton Community Hospital announced that it had received $75 million from the Schmidt Family Foundation, one of the largest gifts given to a hospital. The money will help underwrite a new academic medical center focusing on hospital safety. The center will expand Florida Atlantic University's two-year medical training program to four years, qualifying students for a degree from the Miller School of Medicine at the University of Miami.
